1593637021_184rhnxM89SU1gDuPEaQPjynfytkR.body: me and some of my friends from privy are using session , i like it so far but we are more established on matrix. It would be great to see a bridge between session and matrix.

1593724956_18FmpbxghV4UBgrjHpwgU1igoAt2g.body:
> [risenlamb](#comment_1_1EtbY9fVaYMD81efRQEWpRUFEDNdXkNgNY): If you have a laptop make sure to disable to microphone and webcam. They're usually both on the same module and all you have to do is pry off the frame of your screen and unplug the wires. Blocking the camera alone isn't enough when you can still be listened on.

Nowaday lot's of hardware chip are designed with DRM and silly stuff , making sure you can get appropriated hardwares , disabling what is possible in your bios, appropriate operating system and setting always help
